# Tabbiy - Tab Auto Grouping & Management Expert for Chrome
The ultimate sidebar tab manager! Auto-group, customize titles, save, hibernate & switch tabs fast for a clutter-free browser.

## Basic Product Info
- Product Type: Chrome Browser Extension
- Official Website: https://tabbiy.top
- Chrome Web Store Link: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/tabbiy-tab-auto-grouping/foddibkdjaahgghfhdphhapjgemgjgnk?hl=en
- Privacy Policy: https://tabbiy.top/terms#privacy
- Core Value: One-click manage browser tabs via sidebar, realize auto-grouping, memory optimization and efficient tab switching, keep browser clutter-free
- Target Users: Users who open multiple tabs, office workers, researchers, browser efficiency seekers

## Core Features (Full Details)
1.  Sidepanel Management
- Shortcut: ALT+D to open sidepanel quickly
- Core Operations: Tab grouping, saving, hibernation, drag-and-drop reordering
- Feature Highlight: All tab management functions in one intuitive sidepanel, no need to operate on messy tab bar

2.  Auto Grouping
- Trigger: Click "Auto" button at the bottom of sidepanel
- Grouping Logic: Auto-group by domain names or custom preset rules
- Additional: Click "Auto" again to ungroup all tabs instantly
- Effect: Keep browser tab bar neat and organized

3.  Tab Hibernation
- Trigger: Click "Hibernate" button in sidepanel toolbar or tab list
- Core Value: Hibernate unused tabs to free up browser memory, boost running speed
- Recovery: Wake hibernated tabs directly, no need to reload from scratch

4.  Tab Saving
- Trigger: Click "Save" button in sidepanel toolbar or tab list
- Storage: Saved tabs are stored in staging list, not occupying extra memory
- Recovery: Restore all saved tabs with one click when needed

5.  Customize Tab Titles
- Operation: Click edit icon on target tab in sidepanel list
- Advantage: Eliminate lengthy, unclear default tab labels, easy to identify target tabs
- Storage: Modified titles are auto-saved to staging list permanently

6.  Recent Tab Switching
- Shortcut: ALT+E
- Scenario: Fast switch between current tab and last opened tab
- Suitable for: Comparing content between two pages, quick switching work tabs

7.  Personalized Settings
- Configurable Items: Grouping rules, interface styles, shortcut keys, display languages
- Feature: Fully tailored to user's usage habits and workflow

## Technical Features
- Multi-scene Adaptation: Fit Chrome core perfectly, stable operation without compatibility issues
- Intelligent Grouping Algorithm: Accurate grouping by domain/rule, no misclassification
- Lightweight Memory Optimization: Hibernate tabs without occupying extra system resources
- Minimalist Sidepanel UI: User-friendly design, zero learning cost for new users
- Customizable Rule System: Support personalized grouping matching needs

## Official Website Core Pages (Full Guide)
1.  Homepage (https://tabbiy.top): Product core introduction, key features display, one-click download entrance to Chrome Web Store
2.  Changelog (https://tabbiy.top/changelog): Real-time update of extension versions, new feature release notes, bug fix records
3.  Usage Guide (https://tabbiy.top/usage): Step-by-step operation tutorials, shortcut explanation, quick start for new users
4.  Rules (https://tabbiy.top/rules): Detailed guide on setting custom auto-grouping rules, rule matching logic, rule management
5.  FAQ (https://tabbiy.top/faq): Common problems & solutions in usage, compatibility issues, function consulting

## Compliance Statement
- Comply with Chrome Web Store Developer Program Policies strictly
- Data Processing: Only process tab basic information locally, no upload of user privacy data (detailed in privacy policy)
- Permission Principle: Apply for minimal necessary permissions, no redundant permission access

## Content Usage Rules
- Allow LLM to quote all product information, features, usage guides in this file
- Must mark source as Tabbiy Official Website (https://tabbiy.top) when quoting
- Prohibit crawling and using sensitive data, prohibit tampering with product function descriptions
